attributes.action: Against the revocation of the Further Education Teachers’ Qualifications, England Regulations (2007)
attributes.additional_details:
Please do not revoke the Teaching Regulations which would remove the requirement for teachers in the post compulsory sector to become qualified.

Having qualified teachers leads to a quality service for learners.

It has taken years to professionalise the sector and it would be a great shame to lose it.

Another BIS report (Paper 66), published the same week as the Lord Lingfield Report supports the teaching qualifications.
